sense.def: Pathological Condition of jia 瘕 , conglomeration-illness, in the abdomen that is shaped like a turtle and moves if squeezed. It was believed that such a condition could result from eating turtles. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 19: 鱉瘕者，謂腹中瘕結如鱉狀是也 , “ ‘ Turtle[-shaped] conglomeration-illness ’ ; that is to say: these are conglomeration-illness nodes in the abdomen that have the shape of a turtle”.
